title: South Africa takes a tax gamble ahead of election
text:
South Africa takes a tax gamble ahead of election 1:55pm EST - 01:41 
South Africa's new leadership announced on Wednesday it was taking the politically risky step of raising value-added tax for the first time in 25 years, part of efforts to cut the deficit and stabilise debt under new President Cyril Ramaphosa. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
